item.headline: International Outreach
item.copy: Jesus declared, but you shall receive power when the Holy Spirit has come upon you; and you shall be witnesses to Me in Jerusalem, and in all Judea and Samaria, and to the end of the earth. (Acts 1:8 NKJV) As a fulfillment of what was spoken to Bishop Loren Covarrubias when he graduated ministerâ€™s candidate school, we have reached out to the world with the message of the new day. Starting in El Salvador with the establishment of our apostolic outreach through Rick Munoz, we have now added a TV station in Peru. Currently, we are listening to the Lord and following His lead as we continue to reach beyond; fulfilling His commission first in Jerusalem, then Judea and Samaria, and then all of the earth.
